definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Repeat this process, to keep your inboxes empty .
sentences.chinese: 重复这些步骤，保持你的收件箱为空。

sentences.english: One resource I rather value is my e-mail inbox.
sentences.chinese: 我的电子邮件收件箱是我非常重视的一个资源。

sentences.english: I don't want to flood your inboxes.
sentences.chinese: 我不想洪水您的收件箱。

sentences.english: Personal inboxes can be created as well.
sentences.chinese: 也可以创建个人收件箱。

sentences.english: Voice Inbox is an answering machine for your phone.
sentences.chinese: 声音的收件箱是一个电话应答机为你的电话。

sentences.english: Addicted to the "reply all" function, this "cc" supporter clogs colleagues' already-overflowing inboxes with unnecessary messages.
sentences.chinese: 他们用不必要的信息阻塞了同事们已撑满了的收件箱。

sentences.english: Are you an inbox zero freak like me?
sentences.chinese: 你像我一样是个收件箱洁癖症患者吗？

sentences.english: Check and process your inboxes once a day .
sentences.chinese: 每天检查并且处理你的收件箱。

sentences.english: The larger column on the left is basically your inbox.
sentences.chinese: 左边的那个大竖栏基本上是你的收件箱。

sentences.english: Combined inbox to browse E-Mail from multiple accounts in one page.
sentences.chinese: 支持多个Email帐号的收件箱融合到一个页面中。

sentences.english: There are lots of tidbits you can extract from your inbox.
sentences.chinese: 从你的收件箱中可以挖掘出很多花絮出来。

sentences.english: The Inbox low watermark value must be smaller than the high watermark value.
sentences.chinese: “收件箱”的低水位线值必须小于高水位线值。

sentences.english: Lists the user-created folders in the Inbox.
sentences.chinese: 列出用户创建的文件夹在收件箱中。

sentences.english: The boxes are forty by fifty centimeters and are called supers.
sentences.chinese: 收件箱的第四十由第五十厘米，被称为超级。

sentences.english: You can also write an agent to automatically "trim" Inboxes.
sentences.chinese: 还可以写一个代理来自动“整理”收件箱。

sentences.english: The paper form is then delivered to the inbox of the purchasing admin team.
sentences.chinese: 然后该纸质表单被发送到采购管理团队的收件箱。
